Index.title: SC ZNOJMO
Index.subtitle: Embrace the heartbeat of a football passion

AboutHome.title: SC ZNOJMO, SINCE 1953
AboutHome.description1: Znojmo is a rich historical and sport culture city and our aim in the Club as President has been to build a club that the city deserves. We target now to be leading sporting mindset internationally and keep in line to reach the top elit of the czech professional football. While always placing our local community at the heart of everything we do.
AboutHome.description2: I am very proud of what we have collectively achieved at Znojmo SC in such a short time. For our fans and for our wider community, I'm excited for our futur ahead

ExploreHome.title: EXPLORE OUR WEBSITE
ExploreHome.description: We are happy to announce that we have reviewed and update our website to become our main channel of communication. More features are coming soon to Shop, for News and to download free tickets!

CTA.title: HAVE A QUESTION?
CTA.description: As a partner, a fan or just a professional our admin team is here to support at any time, so do not hesitate

About.Title: OUR STORY
About.Description1: Our Club won promotion from the Czech Fourth Division in 2002, finishing first in Division D in the 2001–02 season. We followed this with eight seasons in the Moravian–Silesian Football League, before winning another promotion in 2010. We bravely secured promotion to the Czech 2. Liga two matches before the end of 2009–10 season. We have finished to lead the club to a first-place finish in the 2012–13 Czech 2. Liga and We proudnly celebrated promotion from the Czech 2. Liga, winning the right to play in the top tier for the first time in our history.
About.Description2: We finished bottom of the 2013–14 Czech First League. From that prime times we have seen a very slow uninteresting move that relegate us in competitive MSFL. We are now living a revolution handover of the club with a new ownership and expertise team that has taken the challenge to bring back Znojmo FC and its fans at his prime. The version 2023 and onward is the most international new talent team of the league.
About.Description3: Znojmo's home stadium is Městský stadion (Znojmo), a venue that surpasses the League's expectations with its infrastructure. The club's facilities are well-equipped to not only host the professional league but also to welcome citizens, athletes, schools, and fans. The green park area surrounding the pitch adds to the charm and functionality of the stadium, making it a prime location for sporting events and community gatherings.
About.Description4: The club's commitment extends to nurturing future talent through its academy, which is seen as the next step in its development. Staff members are dedicated to ensuring that the academy serves as a solid foundation for young athletes, providing them with the necessary resources to excel. This investment in youth development is a testament to the club's vision for growth and its role in the community.
About.DescriptionTop: We are the most diverse team of the league, with more than 10+ nationality, our vision is to promote the football values (REE) as a primary education in our daily life, Respect, Excellency, and Efforts. We are inclusive and looking to develop disables team, women’s division, gaming community.

Team.Title: OUR TEAM
Team.Description1: At Pride First, we are committed to upholding the legacy of Szojmo by exemplifying excellence in sports and ethical values.

Academy.Title: ACADEMY
Academy.Description1: Our Academy is based on two fundamental aspects: Analysis and Resolution of practical cases, and constant work on the pitch. You will be immersed in the reality of professional football under the guidance of leading professionals.
